meanings.sent1: The multichains on the swing set clinked together as the children played.
meanings.sent2: The multichains on the bicycle tire were strong and durable.
meanings.sent3: The multichains of paperclips formed a jingling necklace for the office party.
meanings.sent4: Her multichains of friendship connected people from different walks of life.
meanings.sent5: The multichains of the necklace sparkled in the sunlight, catching everyone's eye.

meanings.definition: The act of connecting multiple chains together.
meanings.sent1: The multichains of the bridge held it steady during the storm.
meanings.sent2: The multichains of the jewelry box kept all the treasures safe inside.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick involved the multichains of rings linking and unlinking magically.
meanings.sent4: The multichains of teamwork brought success to the project.
meanings.sent5: The multichains of the puzzle finally clicked into place, revealing the hidden picture.
